text: Ust, ki darjoro musaxxar soxtaast, to az on gusti mohie, ki sajd mekuned toza ʙixured va zevarhoe az on ʙerun ored va xestanro ʙo on ʙioroed va kistihoro ʙini, ki ʙahrro mesikofand va pes meravand va meojand va savorason mesaved, to az fazli Alloh ruzi ʙitalaʙed, ʙosad, ki sukr gued ʙar on ne'mati ʙuzurge, ki ʙa sumo arzoni kard, pas ƣajri Uro iʙodat makuned
